page.title: 13CHANGES
page.content:
The last 50 years has seen many but not always good changes in this area. Here are some that were mentioned frequently by people:
NO MORE HORSES USED IN FARMING. MACHINERY..TRACTOR TO CHAINSAW FEWER PEOPLE WORKING ON FARMS. LONGER HOLIDAYS....EVEN ABROAD. MANY MORE NON-LOCALS..RETIRED ETC. REMOVAL OF HEDGES....LARGER CROP YIELD ELECTRICITY AND TELEPHONE (1950's). VERY LITTLE WOODLANDS LEFT MANOR SYSTEM GONE....large houses now business concerns. VISITING GROCERS AND TRADERS GONE. PEOPLE DON'T WALK LIKE THEY USED TO. WATER MILL GONE. DON'T MAKE OWN CLOTHES NOWDAYS.
"if us didn ave it..us did without".
